channel.title: Need help with this coding please
channel.description:
Need help with the coding for adding more items to the ::pickup list and to be able to put more items in the shops.
Like the new gloves (Dragon,Barrows), enchanted, and pirate gear
Can anyone help with what the coding is and where to add it or replace something with it ?

item.title: Need help with this coding please
item.dc:creator: @xXOwnage xXOwnage
item.description:
@xXOwnage wrote:

How do i update my cache ?[quote=“anarchy, post:4, topic:24755”]ok dude simple as pie update your cache add items to the item.cfg and your all set :D[/quote][br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 05:56:58 PM[/size][hr][quote=“xXOwnage”]How do i update my cache ?[quote author=anarchy link=topic=37432.msg450898#msg450898 date=1163393042]
ok dude simple as pie update your cache add items to the item.cfg and your all set
[/quote][/quote]
